remarks: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit substitution.  New proofs should use ~ sbie instead.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-1994.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
sbieh.1 $e |- ( ps -> A. x ps ) $.
sbieh.2 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
sbieh $p |- ( [ y / x ] ph <-> ps ) $.
